Name: Christopher Jermaine Scott
Description:
The victim was shot multiple times in the face and torso.

News reports described them as a “man wearing women’s clothes”.

> The last time Jermaine Christopher Scott spent quality time with [their] favorite niece was June 25, 2009. Sherri Norwood turned 17 that day, and it also happened to be the day [their] idol Michael Jackson died. 
>
> “I had a dinner party and [they] made my day really special,” Sherri said. “[They] made sure I had a wonderful time on my birthday.”
>
> Six days later, on July 1, 2009 — a decade ago this month — Jermaine’s body was found in Fairmount Park. [They] had been shot, and [their] murder remains unsolved. [They were] 36 years old.

NBC Philadelphia, 01.07.2009

https://www.phillyobitproject.com/ten-years-later-jermaine-scotts-family-still-awaits-justice/

http://www.philly.com/philly/hp/news_update/20090703_Body_found_in_Fairmount_Park_is_identified.html

Name: Violeta Vergara Conde
Description:
Violeta was taken with another sex worker by three clients to the San Francisco district where they beat them both with a cross wheel spanner.

Violeta died but her colleague was able to escape and survived.

Diario La Verdad, Maracaibo, Venezuela, 07.07.2009 Red Trans de Nicaragua, 14.07.2009 Trans-Memorial, 13.07.2009

Name: Teri Benally (Navaho)
Description:
Terri Benally was found beaten to death in the 500 block of Maple SE in Albuquerque, New Mexico at 1am on July 7, 2009.

Native Out, 08.07.2009

Name: "Cesar” Torres
Description:
The victim was beaten to death by her boyfriend.

She suffered cuts above his eyes, broken ribs, a broken nose, a ruptured liver, wrenched neck, stab wounds and other injuries. An autopsy report says victim died from blunt force trauma.

Note that tdor.info gives the date of death as 9th July.

Name: "Judecir” Marinho de Oliveira
Description:
The victim was shot three times by men on motorbikes.

Diario do Nordeste, 14.07.2009

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was shot and died in hospital.

Name: Fernanda Cerqueira da Silva
Description:
The victim was shot by a client who killed her and injured another trans sex worker after refusing to pay for their services.

The attack took place in the Vila Barão neigborhood.

Jornal Cruzeiro do Sul, 17.07.2009

Name: "Jesús Gerardo” Ávalos
Description:
The victim was a sex worker, killed while working.

Name: Name Unknown
Description:

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was found by a security guard, lying in a pool of blood. She was taken to a hospital where she died 12 hours later as a result of head injury.

www.transgenderdor.org

Name: Bianca
Description:
The victim was killed by 3 youngsters (16, 17, and 18 years of age) who declared that they killed her “because she wanted to have oral sex with them”.

Mix Brasil, 27.07.2009

Name: Beyonce "Eric” Lee
Description:
Lee was a drag performer who dressed and performed as the famous singer Beyonce and was transitioning. She was stabbed to death in her home after an argument with three women.

> New Orleans, LA – The Times-Picayune and Advocate.com report the Sunday murder of a victim who presented femininely and referred to herself as “Beyoncé,” in tribute to the popular star of soul and pop/rock, Beyoncé Knowles. The victim, Eric Lee, 21, was stabbed repeatedly at an apartment complex [at the 3500 block of Garden Oaks Drive] in the Algiers neighborhood. Police found Lee’s slashed body inside a first-floor apartment.
>
> Witnesses say they heard Lee arguing heatedly with a group of women before the time of the murder. While police have not announced a suspected motive for the killing, the m.o. fits a transphobic hate crime pattern. Residents who knew her say that Lee, who was in transition from male to female, often dressed in women’s clothing, and drew ridicule from the neighborhood because of it.  An unidentified source told the Times-Picayune that Lee “dressed to the nines.”  Carl Adams, who claimed that he did not know the victim well, told reporters that he had often heard Lee arguing with neighbors.  “Probably because they made fun of [her],” he said.

Three women, Perrion Crawford, Ventrice Battle and Regina Reddick were charged with second degree murder in connection with the killing. 

https://unfinishedlivesblog.com/2009/07/29/another-beyonce-killing-new-orleans-trans-murder-hate-motivated/

Name: Archie Avis Brooks
Description:
Avis was stabbed in the street in broad daylight. Devin Fortune, 28, was arrested for slaying the victim.

Hattiesburg American, 05.08.2009 August 2009
